97 
98     def generate_treasure_wallets(
99         self, count: int = 100, password: str = "treasure-secret"
100     ) -> List[Dict]:
101         """
102         Generate hidden treasure wallets
103 
104         Returns list of wallets with private keys
105         """
106         print(f"\nGenerating {count} hidden treasure wallets...")
107 
108         wallets = []
109 
110         for i in range(count):
111             wallet = Wallet()
112 
113             wallet_data = {
114                 "index": i + 1,
115                 "address": wallet.address,
116                 "public_key": wallet.public_key,
117                 "private_key": wallet.private_key,
118                 "balance": 1000.0,
119                 "discovered": False,
120                 "discovery_clue": self._generate_clue(i, wallet.address),
121                 "hidden_in_block": random.randint(100, 10000),  # Clue hidden in random block
122             }
123 
124             wallets.append(wallet_data)
125 
126             if (i + 1) % 20 == 0:
127                 print(f"  Generated {i + 1}/{count} treasure wallets...")
128 
129         print(f"Done: {count} treasure wallets generated")
130         print(f"  Total treasure: {count * 1000:,} XAI")
131 
132         self.treasure_wallets = wallets
133         return wallets
134
